hero.title: Discover meaningful connections rooted in Sri Lankan culture
hero.subtitle: MatchUp brings together modern matchmaking intelligence with the warmth of our island heritage to help you find a partner who shares your values, dreams, and traditions.
hero.cardSubtitle: Every profile is carefully curated to celebrate the diversity of Sri Lanka—across faiths, languages, and lifestyles.
hero.cardHighlightDescription: Whether you live in Colombo, Jaffna, Kandy, or abroad, MatchUp keeps you close to home.

cardList.first: Authentic profiles verified by our local team
cardList.second: Smart compatibility insights tailored to your preferences

features.title: Why MatchUp stands out for Sri Lankan singles
features.subtitle: We blend technology with tradition to create a safe, vibrant, and culturally rich matchmaking journey.

matchmaking.title: Intelligent matchmaking
matchmaking.description: Advanced compatibility scoring honours your lifestyle, faith, and family values for better matches.

trust.title: Verified community
trust.description: Multi-step verification and human moderation keep our community respectful and genuine.

culture.title: Celebrate diversity
culture.description: Sinhala, Tamil, Muslim, Burgher, and more—find matches that understand the nuances of your traditions.

events.title: Guided experiences
events.description: From curated introductions to family-friendly meetups, we help you take the next step confidently.

stats.success: Couples matched in the first three months

story.title: A modern way to honour timeless traditions
story.paragraphOne: MatchUp was created by Sri Lankans who wanted a smarter, kinder way to meet a life partner. Our platform respects family expectations while empowering you to choose a relationship that feels right.
story.paragraphTwo: With guidance available in Sinhala, Tamil, and English, and thoughtful privacy controls, you can explore connections at your own pace.

first.quote: We met on MatchUp while I was in Melbourne and Tharushi was in Galle. The cultural filters helped our families connect instantly.

second.quote: The verification process made me feel safe and respected. Within weeks I found someone who shares my values.

third.quote: MatchUp felt like home—thoughtful, warm, and truly Sri Lankan.

cta.title: Ready to meet your perfect match?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of Sri Lankans who have found meaningful relationships through MatchUp.
